item.title: A-Z of JavaScript
item.description: This is my collection of A-to-Z terms that one should know if they are into serious javascript programming. Async/Await Async and Await are new features introduced in the language to make asynchronous code block look synchronous and more importantly make it more readable. Brendan Eich Brendan Eich is the creator of JavaScript. He created the language in a matter of 10 days when working for Netscape Navigator. Due credit to be given to him for creating this language.
